thread.title: New bird flu virus type discovered in Northern Germany
thread.title_full: New bird flu virus type discovered in Northern Germany

author: Okogba
title: New bird flu virus type discovered in Northern Germany
text:
Home » News » New bird flu virus type discovered in Northern Germany New bird flu virus type discovered in Northern Germany On 8:38 pm In News by Okogba Comments 
A new variant of bird flu has been discovered in domesticated animals in the Northern German state of Schleswig-Holstein, the State Agriculture Ministry reported on Monday. 
“This discovery shows how dynamic the bird flu is,’’ said state Agriculture Minister Robert Habeck. “The virus is still present and is changing.’’ 
The new version has been given the subtype categorisation H5N5. 
Researchers at the Friedrich-Loeffler Institute, which made the discovery, said treatment for the new subtype was the same as already being used to fight the H5N8 subtype, according to the ministry. Okogba
